content: Hoho, I'm so glad you like the clothes we picked out for you. As for more gifts... There will surely be more in time.
info: 房屋后露卡-莫白_主流程文本

content: About the gift <style=Highlight>Loomi Co.</style> sent to your PuffPost Box... {A挠头}Did you like it?
info: 房屋后露卡-莫白_主流程文本

content: You getting settled in{A笑哈哈} makes it feel like the whole planet has finally come together.
info: 房屋后露卡-莫白_主流程文本

content: Hoho, no worries! The PuffPost Box's capacity is limitless. you can pick it up whenever you like.
info: 房屋后露卡-莫白_主流程文本

content: This jar of <style=Highlight>Luca</style> filled up while you were sorting out your house. Go ahead and water the Luca Sapling with it.
info: 房屋后露卡-莫白_主流程文本

content: Hoho, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, welcome! Looks like your home is all set.
